attributes.action: Legalize abortions at any age of the pregnancy
attributes.additional_details:
an abortion should happen if the biological parents of a fetus do not want it and they shouldn't have the guilt of delivering unwanted life to the world simply because they waited too long after conception to decide that.
Instead if both parents don't want a baby  then they can choose as responsible adults that they can abort their own creation under the same law as contraception.
